title: Equinox Esport recruiting Coach and Manager
body:
Equinox is looking to finalise our roster with a coach and manager.

Our Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/EquinoxEsportsOCE/

Our Twitter
https://twitter.com/EquinoxOCE?lang=en-nz

**Manager:**
Book in scrims (3 - 4 times a week max)
Scrim reminder
Ensure players are all setup prior to scrim
Organise substitutes for unavailable players
Lobby setup between matches (not required but would be helpful)
Do not need to stay for whole matches.

Prospects of pay based on quality of work.

**Coach:** (3 - 4 scrims a week max)
Pick and Ban
Strategic Coach
Analysis on gameplay 
Player growth and improvement
Relaying of information is vital

Incentive based pay.
